sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REST the continuance of a body in the ſame place, or its continual application or contiguity to the ſame parts of the ambient or contiguous bodies ; and therefore is oppoſed to motion. See the article Mo-TION.

p.hi: Rest, in poetry, is a ſhort pauſe of the voice in reading, being the ſame with the cæfura, which, in Alexandrine verſes, falls on the ſixth ſyllable ; but in verſes of 10 or 11 ſyllables, on the fourth. See Poetry, Part III.
